name: Tales of harmony
description:
"Tales of Harmony" is a fantasy adventure game based on the whims of four chinese college students.

the game tells the story of a prince of a country who gradually uncovers the darkness of the world through adventures and builds strong bonds with new friends.

note: this game is only available in chinese.

we are grateful that we can set up an English version in the near future, as we really want to share our thoughts and interact with great game designers around the world.
